name: diabetesathomeapp

scripts.dev:
echo "
View app at: 
	http://127.0.0.1:3000 
		or 
	http://localhost:3000 

Press CMD-C to quit
" && set NODE_ENV=development && node index.js
scripts.deploy: git push heroku main && heroku ps:scale web=1

author: Aditya Ajit, Dash Park, Evie Hadlow, Fane Ye, Grant Holtes, Tanay Khandelwal
